content:
On March 16, 2022, Russian troops purposefully and cynically destroyed the dramatic theater in the heart of Mariupol.

About thisinformsMariupol City Council in its telegram channel, reports the Armyinform.

“Mariupol Drama Theater - Words that have become a symbol of the devastating and cruel war of Russians against peaceful people. Words that cause pain in millions of people around the world, ”the message reads.

Two years ago, the enemy's plane dropped a bomb on a building where hundreds of peaceful Mariupols were hiding with their children.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat in Odessa declared a day of mourning.
title: Two years ago, the rashists destroyed the Drama Theater in Mariupol
description: The Mariupol City Council informs about it in its telegram channel, reports the Armyinform. ...
author: Army Inform
